attributes.action: make illegal leaving office lights on at night time when not in use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every time i see Canary Wharf at night time i'm amazed at the amount of lights on. Huge buildings with floor after floor lit up. 

This the same story across the country, whats more the energy bill reductions would benefit stakeholders and the profit from reduced bills could be offered to workers in their pay.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "make illegal leaving office lights on at night time when not in use."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13123.asp
